channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for OR

item.title: Report X-2024091465
item.description:
Report X-2024091465

Identified by scraper @ 2024-09-25T09:22:06+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-09-20
  • City: SPRINGFIELD
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On Sept 20th a dock bag was discovered that contained a FedEx Clinical pak that was marked as UN3373, Biological Substance, Category B, 6.2 and was leaking. The package was cleaned up and no liquid ever left the dock bag. The spill was cleaned up and disposed of. The NRC was contacted per policy.

item.title: Report X-2024091343
item.description:
Report X-2024091343

Identified by scraper @ 2024-09-23T09:15:38+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-08-31
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: PSC CALLED FOR PACKAGE LEAKING FLOUR. SUBSEQUENT DAMAGE INSPECTION REVEALED AEROSOL CANS OF MAZOLA CANOLA COOKING SPRAY, BUT NO MAZ MAT LABELS ON OUTSIDE OF PACKAGE. UPS UNDECLARED HAZMAT PROTOCAL INITIATED.
